# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "C:/Program Files/LLVM/bin/clang")
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "C:/Program Files/LLVM/bin/clang++")
project(vulkanLearn LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_executable(vulkanLearn "")
set_target_properties(vulkanLearn PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "vulkanLearn")
set_target_properties(vulkanLearn PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(vulkanLearn SYSTEM PRIVATE
    C:/Users/Alegmito/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glm/1.0.1/35167da92bb142f09a676f46ae259f75/include
    C:/Users/Alegmito/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.4/a03560ce548f4eca8ab682a4dbea04b2/include
    C:/VulkanSDK/1.3.243.0/include
)
target_compile_definitions(vulkanLearn PRIVATE
    GLFW_INCLUDE_NONE
)
target_compile_options(vulkanLearn PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(vulkanLearn PRIVATE /EHsc)
elseif(Clang)
    target_compile_options(vulkanLearn PRIVATE -fexceptions)
    target_compile_options(vulkanLearn PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
elseif(Gcc)
    target_compile_options(vulkanLearn PRIVATE -fexceptions)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET vulkanLearn PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(vulkanLearn PRIVATE
    glfw3
    opengl32
    vulkan-1
    user32
    shell32
    gdi32
)
target_link_directories(vulkanLearn PRIVATE
    C:/Users/Alegmito/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.4/a03560ce548f4eca8ab682a4dbea04b2/lib
    C:/VulkanSDK/1.3.243.0/lib
)
target_link_options(vulkanLearn PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(vulkanLearn PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
    src/vulkanengine_window.cpp
    src/vulkan_app.cpp
)
